languages.text: "Твоя надменность тебе не изменяет. Да, я вас недооценил. Тебя, твою свиту, кровавых фанатиков и эту суку Иокасту. Кто ждал такой прыти от кучки ложноверцев?"

"Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue, those bloody zealots, and that sadist Jocasta. Who would have expected such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"
languages.original_text: "Твоя надменность тебе не изменяет. Да, я вас недооценил. Тебя, твою свиту, кровавых фанатиков и эту суку Иокасту. Кто ждал такой прыти от кучки ложноверцев?"

traits.locale_text: "Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue, the bloody fanatics and that bitch Jocasta. Who would expect such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

traits.locale_text: "Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue — those bloody fanatics and that bitch, Jocasta. Who would have expected such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

traits.locale_text: "Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue, those bloody zealots, and that sadist Jocasta. Who would have expected such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

traits.locale_text: "Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue, those bloody zealots, and that sadist Jocasta. Who would have expected such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: «Tu arrogancia siempre es entretenida. Sí, os he subestimado a ti, a tu séquito, a esos malditos fanáticos y a la sádica de Jocasta. ¿Quién hubiera esperado semejante resistencia de un puñado de falsos creyentes?».
languages.original_text: "Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue, those bloody zealots, and that sadist Jocasta. Who would have expected such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"

traits.locale_text: «Tu arrogancia siempre es entretenida. Sí, os he subestimado a ti, a tu séquito, a esos malditos fanáticos y a la sádica de Jocasta. ¿Quién hubiera esperado semejante resistencia de un puñado de falsos creyentes?».
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: 「その傲慢さには驚かされるばかりですね。あぁ、あなたを見くびっていたようだ。血に濡れた狂信者、あなたの従者のことも、それにあのサディストのジョカスタのことも。偽りの信者の集団が、これほど激しく抵抗するなんて誰が思う？」
languages.original_text: "Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue, those bloody zealots, and that sadist Jocasta. Who would have expected such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"

traits.locale_text: 「その傲慢さには驚かされるばかりですね。あぁ、あなたを見くびっていたようだ。血に濡れた狂信者、あなたの従者のことも、それにあのサディストのジョカスタのことも。偽りの信者の集団が、これほど激しく抵抗するなんて誰が思う？」
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: “你的傲慢态度始终都是这么有趣。是啊，我确实低估了你和你的随行人员，低估了那些该死的狂热分子，还低估了那个虐待狂约卡斯塔。一群伪神的信徒居然会这么拼死反抗，谁能想象得到呢？”
languages.original_text: "Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue, those bloody zealots, and that sadist Jocasta. Who would have expected such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"

traits.locale_text: “你的傲慢态度始终都是这么有趣。是啊，我确实低估了你和你的随行人员，低估了那些该死的狂热分子，还低估了那个虐待狂约卡斯塔。一群伪神的信徒居然会这么拼死反抗，谁能想象得到呢？”
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: "Eure Arroganz amüsiert mich immer wieder aufs Neue. Ja, ich habe Euch unterschätzt, und auch Euer Gefolge, diese verfluchten Fanatiker und diese Sadistin Jocasta. Wer hätte von einem Haufen falscher Gläubiger einen solch entschlossenen Widerstand erwartet?"
languages.original_text: "Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue, those bloody zealots, and that sadist Jocasta. Who would have expected such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Arroganz amüsiert mich immer wieder aufs Neue. Ja, ich habe Euch unterschätzt, und auch Euer Gefolge, diese verfluchten Fanatiker und diese Sadistin Jocasta. Wer hätte von einem Haufen falscher Gläubiger einen solch entschlossenen Widerstand erwartet?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: « Votre arrogance ne manque jamais de m'amuser. Oui, je vous ai sous-estimés, vous et votre entourage de fanatiques sanguinaires, et même cette sadique de Jocasta. Qui aurait pu s'attendre à une telle résistance de la part d'une bande de faux croyants ? »
languages.original_text: "Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue, those bloody zealots, and that sadist Jocasta. Who would have expected such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre arrogance ne manque jamais de m'amuser. Oui, je vous ai sous-estimés, vous et votre entourage de fanatiques sanguinaires, et même cette sadique de Jocasta. Qui aurait pu s'attendre à une telle résistance de la part d'une bande de faux croyants ? »
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: "Kibrin beni her zaman eğlendirmiştir. Evet, seni azımsadım. Maiyetini, o eli kanlı bağnazları ve sadist Jocasta'yı da. Bir grup sahte inanandan böylesi sert bir direniş kim bekleyebilirdi ki?"
languages.original_text: "Your arrogance never fails to amuse. Yes, I underestimated you, as well as your retinue, those bloody zealots, and that sadist Jocasta. Who would have expected such fierce resistance from a bunch of false believers?"
